channel.title: Posts on The Mighty Source
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Mighty Source

item.title: Core Python Introduction
item.description: An Introduction to Python Python is a general purpose, inerpreted, object-oriented and structural scripting language. For me, it’s the swiss army knife of programming languages. Like any programming enthusiast, I’m always excited to learn a new language. Over the past year, I’ve learned the basics of Haskell, F#, Groovy, and Go. Each one of these is amazing and fun to use. But the fact remains that the one language with which I’ve logged the most hours till date is Python.

item.title: Python Resources
item.description: Learning python is easier than other languages for many reasons. One of the reasons is the tremendous amount of great, free resources to learn from. So here are some resources I found heplful. Books Automate the Boring Stuff with Python - Shows how to write useful programs to do all sorts of things with python. Composing Programs - A python oriented take on the legendary SICP book/course. Think Python: How to Think Like a Computer Scientist - Get immersed in the details.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: For the first post, I want to describe the purpose of this blog. To share and explore the craft of programming by writing simple tutorials and articles. We don’t truly master something until we teach it so I want to challenge myself by consolidating and conveying all that I know for others. I like Python, TypeScript and Go so most of the posts will have something to do them and their ecosystem.
